knimeNode.name: Multi-Surface 3D Plot
knimeNode.shortDescription: Represents multiple surfaces each with different properties, surface datapoints are taken from the input data table.

fullDescription.intro: Represents multiple surfaces each with different properties, all datapoints are taken from the input data table. The node assumes that two columns defined (X,Y) plane for the surface and that each additional column(s) describe the Z-axis value for each corresponding surface. Each independent Z-column completes each surface but X&Y are always shared.
fullDescription.option: Column to use as the X-axis for all the surfaces (numeric columns only)
Column to use as the Y-axis for all the surfaces (numeric columns only)

ports.inPort: Provides one or more (x,y,z) datasets to use for a surface

views.view: Displays the chosen surface(s) with interaction for the user
